接口的使用
com.github.CCweixiao.RowMapper

  • 使用RowMapper的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    com.github.CCweixiao  

    • com.github.CCweixiao中RowMapper的使用

      参数类型为RowMapper的com.github.CCweixiao中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      <T> List<T> HBaseTemplate.find(String tableName, org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Scan scan, int limit, RowMapper<T> rowMapper) 
      abstract <T> List<T> AbstractHBaseTemplate.find(String tableName, org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Scan scan, int limit, RowMapper<T> rowMapper)
      scan 数据
      <T> List<T> HBaseTemplate.findAll(String tableName, int limit, RowMapper<T> rowMapper) 
      abstract <T> List<T> AbstractHBaseTemplate.findAll(String tableName, int limit, RowMapper<T> rowMapper)
      scan 所有数据
      <T> List<T> HBaseTemplate.findAllByFamily(String tableName, String familyName, int limit, RowMapper<T> rowMapper) 
      abstract <T> List<T> AbstractHBaseTemplate.findAllByFamily(String tableName, String familyName, int limit, RowMapper<T> rowMapper)
      scan 某一列簇下的数据
      <T> List<T> HBaseTemplate.findAllByFamilyAndQualifiers(String tableName, String familyName, List<String> qualifiers, int limit, RowMapper<T> rowMapper) 
      abstract <T> List<T> AbstractHBaseTemplate.findAllByFamilyAndQualifiers(String tableName, String familyName, List<String> qualifiers, int limit, RowMapper<T> rowMapper)
      scan 某一列簇下的数据，可以指定需要筛选的字段
      <T> List<T> HBaseTemplate.findAllByPrefix(String tableName, String prefix, int limit, RowMapper<T> rowMapper) 
      abstract <T> List<T> AbstractHBaseTemplate.findAllByPrefix(String tableName, String prefix, int limit, RowMapper<T> rowMapper)
      根据前缀scan 数据
      <T> List<T> HBaseTemplate.findAllByPrefixWithFamily(String tableName, String prefix, String familyName, int limit, RowMapper<T> rowMapper) 
      abstract <T> List<T> AbstractHBaseTemplate.findAllByPrefixWithFamily(String tableName, String prefix, String familyName, int limit, RowMapper<T> rowMapper)
      根据前缀scan数据，指定列簇
      <T> List<T> HBaseTemplate.findAllByPrefixWithFamilyAndQualifiers(String tableName, String prefix, String familyName, List<String> qualifiers, int limit, RowMapper<T> rowMapper) 
      abstract <T> List<T> AbstractHBaseTemplate.findAllByPrefixWithFamilyAndQualifiers(String tableName, String prefix, String familyName, List<String> qualifiers, int limit, RowMapper<T> rowMapper)
      根据前缀scan数据，指定列簇名和需要筛选的字段
      <T> T HBaseTemplate.get(String tableName, String rowKey, RowMapper<T> rowMapper) 
      abstract <T> T AbstractHBaseTemplate.get(String tableName, String rowKey, RowMapper<T> rowMapper)
      get查询数据，可以指定自定义的Row Mapper
      <T> T HBaseTemplate.get(String tableName, String rowKey, String familyName, List<String> qualifiers, RowMapper<T> rowMapper) 
      abstract <T> T AbstractHBaseTemplate.get(String tableName, String rowKey, String familyName, List<String> qualifiers, RowMapper<T> rowMapper)
      get查询某一列簇下的数据，可以指定多个字段，可以指定自定义的Row Mapper
      <T> T HBaseTemplate.get(String tableName, String rowKey, String familyName, RowMapper<T> rowMapper) 
      abstract <T> T AbstractHBaseTemplate.get(String tableName, String rowKey, String familyName, RowMapper<T> rowMapper)
      get查询某一列簇下的数据，可以指定自定义的Row Mapper
